item.title: Starmer Says UK Won’t Be Forced to Choose Between US, China - Bloomberg.com
item.description: Starmer Says UK Won’t Be Forced to Choose Between US, China Bloomberg.comStarmer says he won’t ‘choose between’ the US and China BBCKeir Starmer prepares for his Chinese charm offensive Financial TimesStarmer finally goes to China — and tries not to trigger Trump politico.euUK’s Starmer heads to China to repair ties as he navigates tensions with US Reuters
